ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Simmer the pork for 45-60 minutes until tender before adding vegetables to infuse the broth with flavor
Add potatoes before cabbage since they take longer to cook; cabbage only needs 10-15 minutes
The cooking liquid becomes a flavorful broth that enhances all ingredients
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through building layers of flavor by properly sequencing the addition of vegetables based on cooking times.
